book_title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo

reviews.review_text: Absolutely gripping! The characters are well-developed, the plot twists keep you on the edge of your seat, and the writing style is engaging. Couldn't put it down!
A thrilling ride from start to finish. The intricate plot kept me guessing until the very end. Lisbeth Salander is a fascinating character, and the Swedish setting adds to the atmosphere.
Enjoyed the mystery aspect of the novel, but found some parts to be slow-paced. Overall, a decent read with a unique protagonist.
One of the best thrillers I've read in a long time. The suspense is relentless, and the portrayal of complex characters is masterful. Highly recommend!
Disappointing. I expected more from all the hype surrounding this book. The plot felt disjointed, and the violence was gratuitous.
